document_data.name: Druth's Pillar
document_data.mainbody: '''Druth's Pillar''' was a hollow pillar in the [[Haunted Wing]] of [[Castle Obarskyr]].
document_data.Description: The pillar had the appearance of three pillars fused together. Also, it could swing wide open, revealing a hollow space. It was the only pillar of its design in the whole haunted wing of [[Castle Obarskyr]].
